content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. To help you get scheduled, can I have your name please?
Thank you, Sharon. Can you please provide your address so we can organize the appointment?
Sure. 1834 Pine Crest Dr, Linton, KY 42057.
Thanks! Could you tell me a bit about the plumbing issue you’re experiencing?
My kitchen sink is backing up badly and leaking under the cabinet.

Thank you for explaining the problem, Sharon. I’m sorry, but it looks like your address is outside of our current service area. Unfortunately, we won’t be able to take on this appointment.

If you’d like, I can recommend trying a local company in your area or let me know if you have any questions.
